name: The Masked Defenders
description:
The City of Cascadia is in peril as a resurgence of super powered villains rock the Ocean city. A new team of superheroes rise up to combat this new threat. Take on the role as a government agent tasked with ensuring that these superheroes succeed in their efforts to restore the peace.

Love it? Hate it? Any ideas for improvements? Feel free to send in an ask on my Tumblr : https://ian-lythe.tumblr.com
